scripts.release: git add . && git commit -m "Release v$npm_package_version" && git tag -a v$npm_package_version -m "Release v$npm_package_version" && git push && git push --tags
scripts.reset-node-app: yes | rm -rf examples/node-app/* && mkdir -p examples/node-app && cp templates/node-app/projectfile.yml examples/node-app/ && cd examples/node-app && yes | node ../../src/bootstrap.js run
scripts.reset-nextjs-app: yes | rm -rf examples/nextjs-app/* && mkdir -p examples/nextjs-app && cp templates/nextjs-app/projectfile.yml examples/nextjs-app/ && cd examples/nextjs-app && yes | node ../../src/bootstrap.js run
scripts.test: cd examples/node-app && npm i && npm run test && cd ../nextjs-app && npm i && npm run test
scripts.lint: cd examples/node-app && npm i && npm run lint && cd ../nextjs-app && npm i && npm run lint
scripts.format: cd examples/node-app && npm i && npm run format && cd ../nextjs-app && npm i && npm run format
scripts.typecheck: cd examples/node-app && npm i && npm run typecheck && cd ../nextjs-app && npm i && npm run typecheck
